title: Remove Falsy Values in Python
description: In this challenge, you need to write a Python function that removes falsy values from a list.

meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that removes falsy values from a list, including False, None, 0, and empty strings.
meta.keywords: Python, coding challenge, list, falsy values, filter
